content: the top/dress is knitted completely in the round **----------------------------------------------------------------** **like our patterns ** get our email updates 1 to hear about new designs and subscriber-only special offers **----------------------------------------------------------------** **sizes available ** 6-12 months to fit 16-19 inch chest 1-2 year old to fit 18-20 inch chest 2-3 year old to fit 20-22 inch chest 3-4 year old to fit 21-23 inch chest 4-5 years old to fit 22-24 inch chest 5-7 years old to fit 24-26 inch chest 7-9 years old to fit 25-28 inch chest happy knitting everyone **my newer design for maxi top/dress in smaller sizes and dk yarn can be found by clicking on this link** 2 for an unofficial dutch translation - click this link here 3 1 http //etsy us14 list-manage com/subscribe u=b8a29f2dbeada99b849a99f46&id=6017fcce06 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/maxi-top-dress-in-baby-sizes 3 http //veritybreit blogspot nl/2013/01/eerste-bericht-en-een-patroonvertaling html
